GSD.description:
powerpc: Enable execve syscall exit tracepoint

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 2ea08562ecb549a1a2d125a29d3f9747e95d3e10. For more details please see the references link.
